name: Borderlands 2 Ultimate Vault Hunter Upgrade Pack 2: Digistruct Peak Challenge
name_original: Borderlands 2 Ultimate Vault Hunter Upgrade Pack 2: Digistruct Peak Challenge
description:
Borderlands 2 Ultimate Vault Hunter Upgrade Pack 2: Digistruct Peak Challenge is an action, shooter and RPG game developed by Gearbox Software. It was originally released in 2013. 2K Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Borderlands 2 Ultimate Vault Hunter Upgrade Pack 2: Digistruct Peak Challenge is available on PC, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
